context_of_use: The customer wants to track their orders to know the delivery status.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: to know the delivery status of their orders
description: Lets customers view the status and tracking information for their orders.
triggering_event: Customer initiates the order tracking process.
preconditions: Customer must be logged into their account.
Customer must have placed at least one order.
postconditions: Customer successfully views the tracking information for their orders.
assumptions: The customer has an active account.
The system has access to the order tracking information.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the format of tracking information to be displayed.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects the 'Track Orders' option → System displays the list of orders.
2. Customer selects an order to track → System retrieves and displays the tracking information for the selected order.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the customer has no orders, then the system displays a message indicating no orders are available for tracking.
information_for_steps: 3. Tracking information for the selected order
